items.title: IndusInd Bank shares surge on report that Axis Bank's Rajiv Anand likely strong candidate for CEO role
items.description: HDFC Bank's Group Head of Commercial and Rural Banking Rahul Shukla is also likely to be running for the role, CNBC-TV18 reported.

items.title: Coforge, HCL Tech, other IT names rise up to 3% on hopes of early Fed rate cut, Nasdaq rally
items.description: US stock markets nearing record highs, with the Nasdaq 100 Index higher by 30% since its April lows, outperforming the S&P 500 Index.

items.title: Jio Financial shares rise after SEBI clears Jio BlackRock Broking to operate as stockbroker
items.description: In July 2023, Jio Financial and US-based BlackRock had announced a 50:50 joint venture aimed at entering India’s asset management sector with a digital-first model.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro stock rises in today's trading session
items.description: With a current price of Rs 3688.00, Larsen & Toubro's stock reflects a combination of minor hourly fluctuations within a broader context of positive market sentiment and solid financial performance.

items.title: Tata Consultancy Services shares show moderate gains in today's trading session
items.description: TCS's current trading price reflects a marginal increase following an hourly price surge, amidst a bearish sentiment. The company’s financial stability and consistent performance continue to be key factors for investors.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares trading flat in today's session
items.description: In summary, Bharti Airtel's stock shows a slight increase to Rs 2,014.90, driven by an hourly gain of 0.04%.

items.title: Torrent Pharma shares surge 4% as JPMorgan upgrades to overweight; 18% upside seen
items.description: Torrent Pharma share price: JPMorgan sees Torrent’s India operations as a primary growth engine, backed by sustained momentum in its core therapeutic areas.

items.title: Infosys share trade flat in today's session
items.description: Despite the slight dip in today's session, Infosys remains a significant player in the NIFTY 50 STOCKS. The company's current price is Rs 1,615.90.

items.title: Shree Cements shares rise 2.13% in today's session
items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 30,745.00, Shree Cements' performance reflects a mix of positive price movement and underlying financial trends.

items.title: Nifty Bank hits new all-time high again today, tops 57,300 for the first time ever; PSU stocks shine

items.title: Vedanta, Tata Steel, others rise up to 3% as White House hints Trump's July tariff deadline 'not critical'

items.title: Varun Beverages shares rise 2% as HSBC retains buy call, says recent dip unwarranted
items.description: Varun Beverages share price: The stock is currently valued at a 20 percent discount to the average P/E multiple of the broader consumer packaged goods (CPG) sector, HSBC highlighted.

items.title: Quiet start for Sensex, Nifty after three-day rally but 25,500 holds, mid and smallcaps higher
items.description: India VIX, the fear gauge rose slightly, but still stayed below the 15-mark, indicating a calm and stable environment in the broader market.

items.title: SBI shares rise over 1% as CLSA maintains outperform call; sees 32% upside
items.description: SBI share price: The asset quality of India's largest state-run lender remains robust, marked by an improvement in its gross slippage ratio in FY25—a feat achieved by only a handful of banks, CLSA said.

items.title: Pearl Global Industries: Will the growth pattern remain intact amid macro uncertainty?
items.description: Comprehensive business model offering multi-country, multi-product solutions to global retailers

items.title: Common contract notes goes live today, say sources; FPIs, institutions to benefit most
items.description: Issuance of common contract note was a pending issue and finally its being implemented after assessing the readiness of stakeholders including exchanges, clearing corporations and brokers.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty poised for fourth straight day of gains; key levels to watch on June 27
items.description: The Nifty closed above the key resistance level of 25,500, reinforcing the strength of the ongoing uptrend. With the index holding above this breakout zone, a move higher appears well within reach.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty above 25,600, Sensex up 200 pts; Jio Financial, IndusInd Bank, Adani Ent top gainers
Stocks to Watch Today: Hitachi Energy, Lemon Tree Hotels, Embassy Developments, Western Carriers, Power Mech, Premier Energies in focus on 27 June
items.description: Stocks to watch, 27 June: Stocks like Hitachi Energy India, Mahindra Lifespace Developers,Premier Energies, Western Carriers India, Embassy Developments, Power Mech Projects, UltraTech Cement, Satin Creditcare Network, Aakaar Medical Technologies, Safe Enterprises Retail Fixtures, and Mayasheel Ventures will be in focus on June 27.

items.title: SEBI directs listed entities to share more details on related party transactions for transparency
items.description: SEBI has called for more granular information that needs to be shared to shareholders and audit committee for approval of proposals.

items.title: BHEL bags Rs 6,500 crore contract from Adani Power for 6 thermal units
items.description: BHEL is to supply equipment and supervision of erection and commissioning for the six thermal units of 800MW

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top 10 stocks that moved the most on June 27
items.description: Indian stock markets ended higher on June 27, with benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty rising over 0.35% each, and Nifty Bank hit a record high.

items.title: Taking Stock: Markets rise for a fourth day to take Nifty past 25,600, Nifty Bank hits record high
items.description: Among sectors, except consumer durables, IT and realty, all other indices ended in the green with Capital Goods, Healthcare, oil & gas, power, telecom, PSU Bank up 0.5-1 percent.

items.title: Suzlon Energy shares surge 4.6% amid high trading volumes
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 67.50, Suzlon Energy has demonstrated significant momentum, driven by strong financial results and increased investor activity.

items.title: NBFC firm enters co-lending agreement with SBI for SME products
items.description: The latest agreement represents an extension of the existing partnership between the two entities, aiming to further strengthen their collaborative platform.

items.title: Sensex up 300 pts, Nifty near 25,700; oil & gas, PSU banks lead, mid & smallcaps gain for sixth day
items.description: India VIX, the fear gauge, decline for a fourth session in a row on Friday. Experts say this low volatility landscape indicates reduced fear and bolstered investor confidence, both conducive to a steady upward trend.

items.title: IPOs for Beginners: Your Guide to Going Public!| How Startups Go Public & Make Millions!
items.description: Ever wondered how companies like Apple, Amazon, or Meta became publicly traded giants? It all starts with an IPO—Initial Public Offering. In this quick and witty 3-minute explainer, we break down everything you need to know about IPOs and how they work.

items.title: Prime Focus shares rise up to 20% intraday amid high volume
items.description: In a large block deal during opening trade, around 15.1 million shares of Prime Focus were exchanged, contributing to the spike in volume.

items.title: IDBI Bank disinvestment: How much of it is in the price?
items.description: A potential disinvestment deal has triggered a rally in IDBI Bank. The real attraction will be IDBI Bank’s huge deposits of over Rs 300,000 crore, as of March 2025 end

items.title: Sensex up 200 pts, Nifty crosses 25,600 as oil & gas, metals lead; small, midcaps outperform
items.description: India VXI, the barometer to assess market anxiety, slipped over a percent. Experts say this low volatility landscape indicates reduced fear and bolstered investor confidence, both conducive to a steady upward trend.
